full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 95 of 228 771 LC2Qmax3 Rocchio - Cross 1 Q. And it was done by folks who are at John Jay College here in New York. Do you recall that? 2 A. I don't recall where the authors reside, no. 3 Q. Do you recall that part of the study involved using what they call six vignettes and providing those to 393 undergraduate students? 4 A. I do. 5 Q. And the six vignettes were -- a vignette is like a story, right? 6 A. Yes. 7 Q. And so what the authors were doing were taking these six vignettes, five of them involving what you discussed, the five stages of grooming, and then a sixth vignette which was a non-grooming vignette. Do you recall that? 8 A. I don't recall the exact number of vignettes as I sit here today, but I do recall that they were using vignettes in that study, yes. 9 Q. And they would need a controlled vignette for the purpose of this study which was the sixth vignette. Do you recall that? 10 A. Not specifically as we speak here, but I'm happy to review it if you'd like. 11 Q. Sure. I think you have a binder there that has this at a tab. 12 THE COURT: Dr. Rocchio, could you come little closer 13 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 14 DOJ-OGR-00017968

Do you recall that part of the study involved using what they call six vignettes and providing those to 393 undergraduate students? 4 A. I do. 5 Q. And the six vignettes were -- a vignette is like a story, right? 6 A. Yes. 7 Q. And so what the authors were doing were taking these six vignettes, five of them involving what you discussed, the five stages of grooming, and then a sixth vignette which was a non-grooming vignette. Do you recall that? 8 A. I don't recall the exact number of vignettes as I sit here today, but I do recall that they were using vignettes in that study, yes. 9 Q. And they would need a controlled vignette for the purpose of this study which was the sixth vignette. Do you recall that? 10 A. Not specifically as we speak here, but I'm happy to review it if you'd like. 11 Q. Sure. I think you have a binder there that has this at a tab. 12 THE COURT: Dr. Rocchio, could you come little closer
